practice_phrases: I can't remember.
我记不住。
I can't remember a few words.
我记不住几个词。
I can't remember how to say it.
我记不住怎么说。
I can't remember interesting things.
我记不住有趣的事情。
I can't remember how to say a few words.
我记不住怎么说几个词。
I can't remember what I wanted to say.
我记不住我想说的话。
I can't remember how to say a few words when I wake up.
我醒来的时候记不住怎么说几个词。
I can't remember interesting things when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我记不住有趣的事情。
I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say to my friends.
我记不住怎么对朋友说我想说的话。
Because I think I can't remember, I don't enjoy doing interesting things.
因为我认为我记不住，我不喜欢做有趣的事情。
What I wanted to say.
我想说的话。
I can't remember what I wanted to say.
我记不住我想说的话。
I know what I wanted to say.
我知道我想说的话。
What I wanted to say is interesting.
我想说的话很有趣。
I enjoy what I wanted to say to my friends.
我喜欢对朋友说我想说的话。
I don't know how to say what I wanted to say.
我不知道怎么说我想说的话。
Because I think what I wanted to say is a good thing.
因为我认为我想说的话是件好事。
I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say last week.
我记不住上周怎么说我想说的话。
I'm not trying to finish what I wanted to say as quickly as possible.
我不是在试着尽快说完我想说的话。
When I didn't sleep well, I can't remember what I wanted to say.
当我没睡好的时候，我记不住我想说的话。

lego: what to say / wanted to say
practice_phrases: What to say.
想说的话。
I know what to say.
我知道想说的话。
I don't know what to say.
我不知道想说的话。
What to say is very interesting.
想说的话很有趣。
I can't remember what to say to my friends.
我记不住对朋友想说的话。
So I can remember what to say.
这样我就能记住想说的话。
I don't enjoy what to say when I wake up.
我醒来的时候不喜欢想说的话。
Because I think what to say is a good thing for my friends.
因为我认为想说的话对朋友是件好事。
I can't remember how to say what to say as quickly as possible.
我记不住怎么尽快说想说的话。
When I didn't sleep well last week, I don't know what to say.
上周当我没睡好的时候，我不知道想说的话。
